UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Biological activities of C-terminal 15-residue synthetic fragment of melittin: design of an analog with improved antibacterial activity.
Literature.Author: Subbalakshmi C, Nagaraj R, Sitaram N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli W160-37(MIC=10-15µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 8530(MIC=5-10µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Pseudomonas putida NCIM 2102(MIC=50-60µg/ml)
